body_html:
Okay, then I am in a very similar position as you are right now!

Ref: #10471

TLDR;
I build Polly with LLVM, but I am unable to get Polly's passes initialized in the XLA pipeline.
A solution to your issue will hopefully give some insight to mine as well :)

body:
Okay, then I am in a very similar position as you are right now!

Ref: https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/10471

TLDR;
I build Polly with LLVM, but I am unable to get Polly's passes initialized in the XLA pipeline.
A solution to your issue will hopefully give some insight to mine as well :)
